java.lang.Runnable
public class CopyCat
extends SLPlayer
implements java.lang.Runnable

Rock-scissors-paper player that always copies the opponent's last move.

Version:

1.0 (November 4, 2007),
2.0 (August 10, 2011) Changed to use ApplicationAudioClip
Author:
Sam Scott
